meanings.definition: Aquarelles: paintings done in transparent watercolors
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed her beautiful aquarelles at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely aquarelle of a sunset for my living room.
meanings.sent3: The aquarelles of flowers made the room feel like a garden.
meanings.sent4: Her aquarelles were like windows to a dreamy world.
meanings.sent5: The aquarelles captured the delicate beauty of nature perfectly.

meanings.definition: Aquarelles: a painting done in transparent watercolors
meanings.sent1: The aquarelles on display were truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She gifted me a stunning aquarelle of a mountain landscape.
meanings.sent3: The aquarelles on the wall seemed to come alive with color.
meanings.sent4: His aquarelle was a masterpiece of light and shadow.
meanings.sent5: The aquarelle depicted a serene lake reflecting the sky.

meanings.definition: Aquarelles: to paint in transparent watercolors
meanings.sent1: She aquarelles beautiful landscapes with ease.
meanings.sent2: I love to aquarelle flowers in my spare time.
meanings.sent3: He aquarelles like a professional artist.
meanings.sent4: They aquarelle scenes from their travels around the world.
meanings.sent5: Aquarelling delicate details requires patience and skill.
